top_comment.text:
Wow  Melissa Harris-Perry Obama hardcore loyalists...Okay because she 
dislike idea Snowden for running away...Wow TYT. I still like TYT, but if 
we play devil's advocate here I can personally say TYT is a loyalist to 
Snowden and why?

Last time check folks. Mr. Snowden is criminal because he leaked out very 
sensitive documents which might aid our enemies in the future. Also 
countries like Russia and China aren't loyal to Obama, but loyal to 
America's money. 

Am I right +Fred Williams +Anthony Dash, +zee evans , and +Wendy Michele ﻿
top_comment.author: Isaiah Mullins (Isaiah's Zone)

comments.text:
Well before it was still a wild Idea that exist among conspiracy theorist, 
today its known as fact and possible...
So all the people today that are new are just that..thier minds werent on 
consipracy in the past or thought it was bullshit anyways...
People that been known this are like.. "I told you so!"

Atleast that what it seems to me..

I wouldnt put it past them to create this character with a picture perfect 
life to leak info about something that couldnt be covered up anymore, none 
of the internet bills were passing so they instead came out sayin "fuck 
your laws we are doing this, except it" then used this made up character to 
make it seem normal, and shifting people view on to snowden ..traitor or 
freedom fighter who know lets talk about that instead of the nsa...
comments.author: Darrel D.

comments.text:
Drone Strikes are still big issue which everyone talking about. We already 
know our Government was watching from jump street. So don't know why people 
acting brand new?
comments.author: Isaiah Mullins (Isaiah's Zone)

comments.text:
The video wouldn't play because I have lame signals until Monday. You are 
right though or at least I think the same as you about this matter.
comments.author: Wendy Michele

comments.text:
the question keeps coming up, is he a hero or a traitor. well, I have to 
say he's both. a hero to those who think he revealed important secrets to 
the general public good. and technically a traitor for revealing classified 
information and not seeks asylum for nations worse than government he 
exposed. I don't have any sympathy for him. what did expect was going to 
happen? he ran for a reason. personally, his leak wasn't anything I already 
assumed was happening anyway. media wise you'll find cheerleaders and 
detractors everywhere.
comments.author: Enrique Rea

comments.text:
Melissa Harris-Perry has question the president on his policy and dislike 
the way he does business. Also  Melissa Harris-Perry has talk about Drone 
Strikes.
comments.author: Isaiah Mullins (Isaiah's Zone)

comments.text:
Basically and this guy was making some point. However; Snowden is no hero. 
Also Bradly Manning is a hero and Snowden is not.
comments.author: Isaiah Mullins (Isaiah's Zone)

comments.text: Yep! And his options are running out
comments.author: Fred Williams

top_comment.text:
Snowden is in hiding because he may not get a fair trial or even 
representation if he comes back. MSM can't understand that. And why would 
our government do that? ﻿
top_comment.author: Rita Brown

comments.text:
+Hugh Stegman Or maybe they've convinced themselves that Obama must be 
right because it's more convenient and comfortable to play ball.
comments.author: Rita Brown

comments.text: MSM understands just fine, but Corporate won't allow them to say so.
comments.author: Hugh Stegman

top_comment.text:
I don't really think snowden should get a life sentence but I Also think 
he's stupid.. and should not have leaked anything..﻿
top_comment.author: Richard Mitchell

comments.text:
+Richard Mitchell May I remind you that he validly accused the government 
of illegal activities and courts have upheld that accusation!
That means that he made a valid point and that's exactly why civil 
disobedience is normally being performed. The government should make an 
apology, pardon him for any crime he committed by outing this information 
and explain that men like Snowden make sure a country doesn't become a 
dictatorship. The law in a country is applicable to the entire country 
INCLUDING the government and if somebody shows that the government isn't 
upholding the law, that someone should be hailed a hero, like Rosa Parks, 
Like MLK and like Nelson Mandela who are all turning in their grave from 
the public's not understanding what their example should have made clear 
decades ago!
comments.author: Snowcat1970

comments.text:
dude your a fucking brainwashed pussy.
he leaked illegal activities that our very own government is doing to its 
own people and its allies.
comments.author: Ares. Hades
